hightouch-credentials.name: Hightouch Credentials
hightouch-credentials.description: Block used to manage Hightouch authentication.
hightouch-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Hightouch credentials:
```python
from prefect_hightouch import HightouchCredentials
hightouch_credentials_block = HightouchCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```
